pageContext.claim: “Cows are out [in the Green New Deal]. Cows. They don't want cattle, they don't want cows.”
pageContext.analysis: The retracted FAQ, in what supporters of the Green New Deal said was an attempt at irony, said:  "In 10 years ...we aren't sure that we’ll be able to fully get rid of farting cows and airplanes that fast." This never was part of the final resolution.
